messages.content: Good Morning! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Request authorisation in PBS 3. Track a ticket number 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
1. Report an issue with PBS
You have chosen to report an issue with PBS. Please provide a detailed description of the issue you are experiencing.
i am not able to log into my account

A similar issue was found where a user was unable to log in due to their account being locked after too many attempts. The user contacted the Ops team to unlock their account and was able to log in afterwards. You may want to try contacting the Ops team (exampleOpsForPBS@email.com) to see if they can assist you with unlocking your account. If this doesn't resolve your issue, please provide more details about your issue.
this did not help me
We have received your submission. You can track the ticket using ticket number IN4484715

1. Report an issue with PBS

You have chosen to report an issue with PBS. Please describe the issue you are experiencing, and I will be happy to assist you. If the issue is not resolved, I can provide you with an issue reporting template/form.
i am unable to login into my account

A similar issue was found where a user was unable to login due to their account being locked after too many attempts. The user contacted the Ops team to unlock their account and was able to log in afterwards. You may want to try contacting the Ops team (exampleOpsForPBS@email.com) to see if they can assist you with unlocking your account.

Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Request authorisation in PBS 3. Track a ticket number 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
4. List commonly recurring issues

Based on the information obtained, the top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, Cash desk history not reflecting the payment, and MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS M. For further assistance, please select one of the options: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues. You can also contact our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email example@email.com.
what exactly were the issues for these three common issues? can elaborate?

The top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, Cash desk history not reflecting the payment, and MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS Menu. If you need help with any of these issues or have a different issue, please select one of the following options: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues
can elaborate on the activate Medisave scheme issue?

I don't know. Please select one of the options: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues. 
You can also contact our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email example@email.com for assistance.
can elaborate on the activate Medisave scheme issue?
I don't know. To find more information about the issue, I can list the commonly recurring issues for you.
okay please list the commonly recurring issues

The top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, Cash desk history not reflecting the payment, and MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS Menu. Would you like me to elaborate on any of these issues?
please elaborate on the Medisave scheme issue

1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues. 
You can also contact our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email example@email.com for more information.
4. List commonly recurring issues

The top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS, and Cash desk history not reflecting the payment. Would you like me to elaborate on any of these issues?
Medisave scheme issue

2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues
You can also contact our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email example@email.com for immediate assistance.

give me more details like the incident description of the Medisave scheme from the commonly recurring issues

Based on the information available, the Medisave scheme issue is related to the Medisave balance showing up as zero, or the scheme not being activated or showing up in the payor list. The incident descriptions include issues such as Medisave balance showing up as zero, error messages when trying to activate the scheme, and the scheme not being available in the payor list. If you would like to report an issue related to the Medisave scheme, I can provide you with a form to fill out.
test

Hello! Welcome to the Public Billing System (PBS) support chat. I'm here to help you with any system-related issues. You can reach us directly via our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email us at example@email.com. To get started, please select one of the following options: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues
so when i ask you to elaborate on the common issues can you give me details like that of your previous previous message

Hello! I'm here to help you with the Public Billing System (PBS) for Tan Tock Seng Hospital in Singapore. You can reach us directly at 12345678 or example@email.com for immediate assistance. I have four main functionalities to assist you: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues
Please select one of the options by typing the number or the name of the functionality.
wow youre useless

Track a ticket number 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
4. List commonly recurring issues

Based on the information, the top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS, and Cash desk history not reflecting the payment. Would you like me to elaborate on any of these issues?
elaborate on cashdesk history issue
I don't know
elaborate on cashdesk history issue

Based on the information available, the cashdesk history issue is related to a problem where the cash desk history is not reflecting the payment made. This issue occurred when the page was refreshed while collecting payment. The description of this issue is: 'Refreshed page while collecting payment, thus cash desk history not reflecting the payment made.'

Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Request authorisation in PBS 3. Track a ticket number 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
4. List commonly recurring issues

Based on the information, the top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS, and Medisave scheme not activated or not working. Would you like me to elaborate on any of these issues?
Elaborate on medisave issue

Based on the information available, the Medisave issue is related to the Medisave scheme not being activated or not showing up in the payor list. For example, one incident reported that the Medisave balance showed up as zero, while another incident reported that the Medisave scheme was not activated even though the patient was eligible. The incident descriptions suggest that there may be technical issues or errors with the system that are causing these problems.
how about the MT band issues

I don't know. Please select one of the options: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues. 
You can also contact our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email example@email.com for assistance.
elaborate on the MT band issues

Based on the information available, the MT band issues seem to be related to the MT Band/Subsidy schemes not showing up on the Public Billing System (PBS) for certain patients. The incident descriptions mention error messages appearing, such as 'National Means Testing Scheme error' and 'MTSOC (specialist outpatient) not showing'. These issues are prioritized as 2 and are still open. If you would like to report a similar issue or request assistance, please let me know.
explain the cashdesk issues

Based on the information available, the top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, Cash desk history not reflecting the payment, and MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS. You mentioned 'cashdesk issues', which seems to be related to the 'Cash desk history not reflecting the payment' issue. This issue occurs when the page is refreshed while collecting payment, thus not updating the cash desk history. If you would like to know more about this issue or report a new issue, please let me know.
please let me know more

The incident description for this issue is that the page was refreshed while collecting payment, thus the payment was not reflected in the cash desk history. If you would like to know more or report a specific issue, please let me know.

can you explain all these issues

The top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS, and Cash desk history not reflecting the payment. If you would like me to elaborate on any of these issues, please let me know.

Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Request authorisation in PBS 3. Track a ticket number 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
4. List commonly recurring issues

The top three common issues are: Unable to activate Medisave scheme, MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS, and Cash desk history not reflecting the payment. If you would like me to elaborate on any of these issues, please let me know.
explain the cashdesk issue

Based on the information available, the cashdesk issue is related to a problem where the cash desk history is not reflecting the payment made. This issue occurred when the page was refreshed while collecting payment. If you are experiencing a similar issue, please try to avoid refreshing the page during payment collection.
explain the medisave issue

The Medisave issue is a commonly recurring problem where the Medisave scheme is not activated or not showing up in the payor list, and the Medisave balance is showing as zero. For example, one incident reported that the Medisave balance showed up as zero, and another incident reported that the Medisave scheme was not activated even though the patient was eligible. These issues are causing problems with patient payments and billing.
explain the mt band issue

The MT Band issue refers to an error where the National Means Testing Subsidy schemes are not showing up on the Public Billing System (PBS) for patients. This issue has been encountered by multiple users, with incident descriptions mentioning error messages and the inability to access the subsidy schemes. The issue seems to be related to the system's functionality and has been reported with a priority level of 2.
